Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructionState, EndscreenState, VerifyState, VoyageState, WaitingState
public abstract class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing the state of a game of Galaxy Trucker.
See Also:

    • validate

      public abstract void validate(ServerMessage message) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Validates and applies logic of a ServerMessage, transitioning the {GameState if certain conditions are satisfied.
      Parameters:
      message - ServerMessage Message to validate.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if the model refuses the message in any sort of way.

    • getNext

      public abstract GameState getNext()
      Returns the state following the current one according to its internal logic, returns null if the game is finished.
      Returns:
      {GameState Next state to play.

    • getClientState

      Returns client side representation of the {GameState.
      Returns:

      public abstract ClientGameListEntry getOngoingEntry(int id)
      Generates and returns a GameListEntry object containing the lobby details.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      ClientGameListEntry Entry containing the lobby info.

    • putComponent

      public void putComponent(Player p, int id, ShipCoords coords, ComponentRotation rotation) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Inputs the request by a Player to place a BaseComponent at a location with a rotation.
      Parameters:
      p - Player Player requesting to place.
      id - ID of the component being placed.
      coords - ShipCoords Coords where the BaseComponent is being placed.
      rotation - ComponentRotation Rotation of the component being placed.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if the {GameState refuses the request.

      Inputs the request by a Player to select a SpaceShip blob.
      Parameters:

      blob_coord - ShipCoords Coords of the selected SpaceShip blob.

      ForbiddenCallException - if the {GameState refuses the request.

    • getCardState

      public CardState getCardState(Player p) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Requests on behalf of a ServerMessage the CardState if available.
      Parameters:
      p - Player Player sending the ServerMessage that requested.
      Returns:
      CardState Current card state.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if the state doesn't have a CardState.
